languages.text: Вольный Торговец пресек{mf||ла} найм беглых преступников. Дефицит квалифицированных кадров был восполнен специально обученными специалистами из числа матросов экипажа.

traits.locale_text: Вольный Торговец пресек{mf||ла} найм беглых преступников. Дефицит квалифицированных кадров был восполнен специально обученными специалистами из числа матросов экипажа.

languages.text: The Rogue Trader put a stop to the recruitment of fugitive criminals. The qualified personnel shortage was solved by appointing specially trained voidsmen from among the crew.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец пресек{mf||ла} найм беглых преступников. Дефицит квалифицированных кадров был восполнен специально обученными специалистами из числа матросов экипажа.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader put a stop to the recruitment of fugitive criminals. The qualified personnel shortage was solved by appointing specially trained voidfarers from among the crew.
The Rogue Trader put a stop to the recruitment of fugitive criminals. The qualified personnel shortage was solved by appointing specially trained voidfarers from among the crew.
The Rogue Trader put a stop to the recruitment of fugitive criminals. The qualified personnel shortage was solved by appointing specially trained voidfarers from among the crew.
The Rogue Trader put a stop to the recruitment of fugitive criminals. The qualified personnel shortage was solved by appointing specially trained voidsmen from among the crew.
The Rogue Trader put a stop to the recruitment of fugitive criminals. The qualified personnel shortage was solved by appointing specially trained voidsmen from among the crew.

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat der Rekrutierung geflohener Verbrecher ein Ende gesetzt. Der Mangel an qualifiziertem Personal wurde durch Ernennung speziell ausgebildeter Raumfahrer aus der Crew beseitigt.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader put a stop to the recruitment of fugitive criminals. The qualified personnel shortage was solved by appointing specially trained voidsmen from among the crew.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat der Rekrutierung geflohener Verbrecher ein Ende gesetzt. Der Mangel an qualifiziertem Personal wurde durch Ernennung speziell ausgebildeter Raumfahrer aus der Crew beseitigt.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a mis fin au recrutement des hors-la-loi. Le manque de personnel qualifié a été compensé en recrutant des cosmomarins aguerris de l'équipage.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader put a stop to the recruitment of fugitive criminals. The qualified personnel shortage was solved by appointing specially trained voidsmen from among the crew.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a mis fin au recrutement des hors-la-loi. Le manque de personnel qualifié a été compensé en recrutant des cosmomarins aguerris de l'équipage.

languages.text: 行商浪人不再从逃犯之中招募船员，而是下令对船员进行特殊的专业训练，从而解决技术船员短缺的问题。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader put a stop to the recruitment of fugitive criminals. The qualified personnel shortage was solved by appointing specially trained voidsmen from among the crew.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人不再从逃犯之中招募船员，而是下令对船员进行特殊的专业训练，从而解决技术船员短缺的问题。
行商浪人不再从逃犯之中招募船员，而是下令对船员进行特殊的专业训练，从而解决技术船员短缺的问题。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente puso fin al reclutamiento de delincuentes fugitivos. La falta de personal cualificado se solucionó ascendiendo a infantes del vacío de la tripulación con entrenamiento especializado.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader put a stop to the recruitment of fugitive criminals. The qualified personnel shortage was solved by appointing specially trained voidsmen from among the crew.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente puso fin al reclutamiento de delincuentes fugitivos. La falta de personal cualificado se solucionó ascendiendo a infantes del vacío de la tripulación con entrenamiento especializado.

languages.text: ローグトレーダーは逃亡犯罪者の採用を中止した。人材不足は、クルーの中から特別に訓練されたヴォイズマンを任命することで解決された。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader put a stop to the recruitment of fugitive criminals. The qualified personnel shortage was solved by appointing specially trained voidsmen from among the crew.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーは逃亡犯罪者の採用を中止した。人材不足は、クルーの中から特別に訓練されたヴォイズマンを任命することで解決された。

languages.text: Hür Tacir, kaçak suçluların işe alınmasına son verdi. Nitelikli personel eksikliğiyse mürettebattan özel olarak eğitilmiş uçsuz erlerinin atanmasıyla çözüldü.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader put a stop to the recruitment of fugitive criminals. The qualified personnel shortage was solved by appointing specially trained voidsmen from among the crew.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir, kaçak suçluların işe alınmasına son verdi. Nitelikli personel eksikliğiyse mürettebattan özel olarak eğitilmiş uçsuz erlerinin atanmasıyla çözüldü.
